attributes.action: remove the ban on incandescence light bulbs.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
the government signed up to a european decision to replace our bulbs without any consultation in the house of commons or with the public.
the replacement energy efficient bulbs are a greater threat to our environment
and should not be forced upon us.we are entitled to choice

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
